Description: With Hardshell Case, Ebony/Bone Bridge, and USA Wiring upgrade all performed by Phred Instruments in their CA shop. This is a gorgeous guitar. I ordered it new from Phred Instruments in March 2018 and received it in October 2018. I really like it, but decided that I have too many guitars and in the few months I've had this, I've only played it a few times. Since we're making room for more kids, I need to clear out some music gear. That's the only reason I'm selling it. This guitar would retail for about $1,075 with the options it has: Guitar, Hardshell Case, Ebony/Bone Bridge, USA wiring, but you could get it for less AND you won't have to wait 7 months to get it, like I did. Even brand new, this guitar is a tremendous value. Phred is getting quite popular, and for good reason. Hopefully, I'll get another one in the future. NOTE: On the case, there's a small puncture (less than 1/8") a few inches away from the case's handle. I have no idea how it got there. I suspect it was always there and I didn't notice until taking the pictures for this listing. See picture. The guitar itself is spotless, however. The complete specs for this guitar are readily available online, but the key things are as follows:25.5" scale24 frets15" radius fingerboardDouble Humbucker with 3-way toggle and coil tapTone/Volume knobsEbony fingerboardEbony tailpieceUSA wiring (done at Phred Instruments' shop in CA)G&G Hardshell CaseEbony/Bone bridge - installed by Phred Instruments before sending to me
Title: 2018 Dockstar Koa Hollowbody Guitar - w/Extras and Case - Phred Instruments
ConditionDescription: Excellent & like new.  Ready to Ship.
